option.name: codeTemplate
option.value: ###################################################### ## 如何自定义模板参考https://km.sankuai.com/page/70585954 ###################################################### ##@formatter:off @FieldDoc( #if( ${name} ) name = "${name}", #end description = "$!{description}", #if( ${defaultValue} ) defaultValue = "${defaultValue}", #end #if( ${requiredness} ) requiredness = ${requiredness}, #end #if( ${rule} ) rule = "${rule}", #end #if( ${type} ) type = {#foreach(${item} in ${type}) ${item},#end}, #end #if( ${typeName} ) typeName = ${typeName}, #end #if( ${deprecated} ) deprecated = "${deprecated}", #end #if( ${version} ) version = "${version}", #end #if( ${since} ) since = "${since}", #end #if( !${isEnumField} ) example = {#foreach( ${item} in ${example} ) "${item}",#end}, #end ) ##@formatter:on

option.name: codeTemplate
option.value: ###################################################### ## 如何自定义模板参考https://km.sankuai.com/page/70585954 ###################################################### ##@formatter:off @InterfaceDoc( #if( ${name} ) name = "${name}", #end #if( ${id} ) id = "${id}", #end #if( ${serviceId} ) serviceId = "${serviceId}", #end type = "$!{type}", displayName = "$!{displayName}", description = "$!{description}", scenarios = "$!{scenarios}", #if( ${notice} ) notice = "${notice}", #end #if( ${howto} ) howto = "${howto}", #end #if( ${deprecated} ) deprecated = "${deprecated}", #end #if( ${version} ) version = "${version}", #end #if( ${since} ) since = "${since}", #end #if( ${authors} ) authors = {#foreach( ${author} in ${authors} ) "${author}",#end}, #end #if( ${host} ) host = "${host}", #end ) ##@formatter:on

option.name: codeTemplate
option.value: ###################################################### ## 如何自定义模板参考https://km.sankuai.com/page/70585954 ###################################################### ##@formatter:off @MethodDoc( #if( ${name} ) name = "${name}", #end displayName = "$!{displayName}", description = "$!{description}", #if( ${parameters} ) parameters = { #foreach( ${parameter} in ${parameters}) @ParamDoc(## #if( ${parameter.name} ) name = "${parameter.name}",#end #if( ${parameter.type} ) type = {#foreach(${item} in ${parameter.type} ) ${item},#end},#end #if( ${parameter.typeName} ) typeName = "${parameter.typeName}",#end #if( ${parameter.description} ) description = "${parameter.description}",#end #if( ${parameter.rule} ) rule = "${parameter.rule}",#end #if( ${parameter.requiredness} ) requiredness = ${parameter.requiredness},#end #if( ${parameter.defaultValue} ) defaultValue = "${parameter.defaultValue}",#end #if( ${parameter.paramType} ) paramType = ,#end example = {#foreach( ${item} in ${parameter.example} ) "${item}",#end}), #end }, #end #if( ${returnType} ) returnType = ${returnType}, #end #if( ${returnValueDescription} ) returnValueDescription = "${returnValueDescription}", #end #if( ${returnExample} ) returnExample = {#foreach( ${example} in ${returnExample}) "${example}",#end}, #end #if( ${exceptions} ) exceptions = { #foreach( ${exception} in ${exceptions} ) @ExceptionDoc(## #if( ${exception.name} ) name = "${exception.name}",#end #if( ${exception.type} ) type = ${exception.type},#end #if( ${exception.description} ) description = "${exception.description}",#end), #end }, #end #if( ${deprecated} ) deprecated = "${deprecated}", #end #if( ${version} ) version = "${version}", #end #if( ${since} ) since = "${since}", #end #if( ${authors} ) authors = {#foreach( ${author} in ${authors} ) "${author}",#end}, #end #if( ${tags} ) tags = {#foreach( ${tag} in ${tags} ) ${tag},#end}, #end ## restful #if( ${urls} ) urls = {#foreach( ${url} in ${urls} ) "${url}",#end}, #end #if( ${paraDelimiter} ) paraDelimiter = "${paraDelimiter}", #end #if( ${requestMethods} ) requestMethods = {#foreach( ${requestMethod} in ${requestMethods} ) ${requestMethod},#end}, #end #if( ${restHeaders} ) restHeaders = {#foreach( ${restHeader} in ${restHeaders} ) "${restHeader}",#end}, #end #if( ${restConsumes} ) restConsumes = {#foreach( ${restConsume} in ${restConsumes} ) "${restConsume}",#end}, #end #if( ${restProduces} ) restProduces = {#foreach( ${restProduce} in ${restProduces} ) "${restProduce}",#end}, #end #if( ${postDataDescription} ) postDataDescription = "${postDataDescription}", #end #if( ${restExampleUrl} ) restExampleUrl = "${restExampleUrl}", #end #if( ${restExamplePostData} ) restExamplePostData = "${restExamplePostData}", #end #if( ${restExampleRequestHeaders} ) restExampleRequestHeaders = "${restExampleRequestHeaders}", #end #if( ${restExampleResponseData} ) restExampleResponseData = "${restExampleResponseData}", #end #if( ${restExampleResponseHeaders} ) restExampleResponseHeaders = "${restExampleResponseHeaders}", #end #if( ${definition} ) definition = "${definition}", #end #if( ${example} ) example = "${example}", #end #if( ${authentication} == "Yes" ) extensions = { @ExtensionDoc(name = "SECURITY_PRIVILEGE", content = "鉴权逻辑为：") } #else extensions = { @ExtensionDoc(name = "SECURITY_PRIVILEGE", content = "不需要鉴权") } #end ) ##@formatter:on

option.name: codeTemplate
option.value: ###################################################### ## 如何自定义模板参考https://km.sankuai.com/page/70585954 ###################################################### ##@formatter:off @TypeDoc( #if( ${name} ) name = "${name}", #end description = "$!{description}", #if( ${category} ) category = ${category}, #end #if( ${defaultValue} ) defaultValue = "${defaultValue}", #end #if( ${deprecated} ) deprecated = "${deprecated}", #end #if( ${version} ) version = "${version}", #end #if( ${since} ) since = "${since}", #end #if( ${authors} ) authors = {#foreach( ${author} in ${authors} ) "${author}",#end}, #end ) ##@formatter:on
